scripts.s: npm run --silent build && npm run --silent start
scripts.test: npm run --silent update && npm run --silent build && npm run --silent pack-dev && npm run --silent start
scripts.prod: npm run --silent update && npm run --silent build && npm run --silent pack-prod && start npm run start
scripts.update: echo Updating Dependencies... && npm install --silent && echo Dependencies Updated
scripts.users: echo Building... && tsc -p config && echo Build Done! && node config/out/config/userSetup.js
scripts.init: echo Building... && tsc -p config && echo Build Done! && node config/out/config/repo-init.js
scripts.ts-check-client: echo Checking Client TS && tsc -p pages/chat/ts && echo TS Check Done!
scripts.build-and-run: echo use 'npm run s' to only start the server, use 'npm test' to start the server and client watchers
